General.Name: A.F.P. Planvital S.A.
General.Description: Administradora de Fondos de Pensiones PlanVital S.A. is a privately owned investment manager. The firm manages pension funds and individual retirement accounts. It makes its investments in the public equity markets of Chile.  Administradora de Fondos de Pensiones PlanVital S.A was founded in 1981 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
